thread.title: 'Royal Mail destroyed our parcel, but won't pay compensation'
thread.title_full: 'Royal Mail destroyed our parcel, but won't pay compensation'

author: Jessica Gorst-Williams
title: 'Royal Mail destroyed our parcel, but won't pay compensation'
text: Jessica Investigates 'Royal Mail destroyed our parcel, but won't pay compensation' As reader is frustrated that Royal Mail destroyed a whole parcel because it contained, amongst other things, a small bottle of perfume Royal Mail will not send perfume, which is classed as a "dangerous item", abroad. Photo: Getty Images
